ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Digest Number 120
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i personally do baking and tailoring. though i find tailoring now set aside due to the priceiness (sp?) of the other components. if you can forage - i
ygData.messageBody:
>Do any of you do a trade? I am thinking about starting one, but can't
>decide which. I am leaning toward tailoring or baking. If anyone has
>any tips or advice, please let me know.

i personally do baking and tailoring. though i find tailoring now set aside
due to the priceiness (sp?) of the other components.

if you can forage - i highly suggest brewing and baking. two totally fun
skills. i mean - the responses of your group members when you start chowing
down on smoked wood elf, or crunchy troll toes...mmmmmm-hmmmmmmmm. hehe. as
for brewing - swamp water at it's finest ;)

have fun with it - role play, etc. *G* if money is a problem, definitely
stick to the stuff where you can easily find/hunt the components and only
have to buy occasional other ones. *smiles* though with smithing you can
make some money. hehe.
